attributes.action: make Ofcom regulate on-demand television services such as iPlayer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I recently complained to Ofcom about something I saw on iPlayer, and had a letter sent back to me saying that they do not regulate on-demand services. I personally see this as a way for television broadcasters to evade certain broadcasting rules & regulations, and I believe Ofcom should step in and sort this out.
